name: Check Yer Ride
description:
A game devoted to checking your car before you drive it. If you check all eight points, you will drive off with no worries. Try to drive off to early and things won't go so well for you. 

This is a prototype for Serious Game made at Johnson County Community College. The level and car design was created by Dashiell Reid, Menu system created in Fungus by Evan Rump and UI and coding to communicate with buttons and fungus was created by me.
